name: Balloon Bats
summary:
Soar the Skies in Balloon Bats!

Master the art of flight with revolutionary wing-flapping mechanics in this exhilarating multiplayer VR experience! Take to the skies as a bat, feel the rush of wind beneath your wings, and pop balloons in frantic aerial competitions.

Why Players Love Balloon Bats:
Revolutionary Flight System:** Experience true freedom with the most advanced flying mechanics in VR. Flap your arms to soar, dive with precision, glide effortlessly, and climb with agility. 
Aerial Minigame...
